column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
column21: Plunging Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachs√ºchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.
column280: Stellar Predator: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.
column281: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex: If your current active character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.
column282: Gaze of the Deep: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.
column283: Devourer of All Sins: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.
column284: Wings of Nightmare: Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column285: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak: When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents. When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.
column286: Against the Fleeing Light: Increases the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column287: Evernight Raven: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.
